heroDesc: Over 2 Years of experience in frontend development using Javascript

services_cards.title: Web Developer
services_cards.description: I craft high-performance, responsive websites tailored to your business needs. my solutions ensure a secure and seamless user experience.

services_cards.title: Responsive Web Design
services_cards.description: I create visually appealing and functional websites that look great on all devices, from desktops to mobile phones.

services_cards.title: UI/UX Design
services_cards.description: I design intuitive and user-friendly interfaces that enhance user experience and engagement.

services_cards.title: Single Page Applications
services_cards.description: I develop fast and interactive single-page applications using modern JavaScript frameworks like React.js.

services_cards.title: Performance Optimization
services_cards.description: I optimize website performance to ensure fast load times and a smooth user experience.

services_cards.title: Cross-Browser Compatibility
services_cards.description: I ensure websites work seamlessly across all major browsers and platforms.

services_cards.title: Version Control
services_cards.description: I utilize version control systems like Git to manage and track code changes effectively.

services_cards.title: Accessibility
services_cards.description: I build accessible websites that comply with web accessibility standards to ensure inclusivity for all users.
